attributes.action: Change the rules of the house to only allow MPs who attend a debate to vote on the motion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I listened to an excellent debate on the Iraq Inquiry today. Few MPs attended yet everyone turned up to vote. If the vote was made on the evidence from the debate a very different outcome would have emerged. I believe the public votes for an MP hoping that they will treat issues for debate seriously - and there is nothing more serious than taking us into war - then to vote on the evidence. Not just turn up to vote the way their party has decreed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
